name: Dragon Plover
description:
Controlls

ARROW KEYS : Move

Left Click : Grab / Throw

RIGHT CLICK : Use Item

Description

Your dragon friend keeps getting bothered by every creature on earth, so he decided to go to the moon and to take you with him. You better take care of him during your long journey!

Dragon (P)lover is a cute game where you take care of a dragon in order to arrive safely to your destination!

Credits

Code : Gogani & Caberu

Art : Caberu & Philippe

Music & Sound Design : Hivernote
